title: Asian Shares Gain as US CPI Boosts Stocks, Bonds: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities rose after cooling US inflation data backed the case for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts and calming tech jitters supported American stocks.
content: Asian equities rose after cooling US inflation data backed the case for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts and calming tech jitters supported American stocks.
